participant_1.name: Sophie Turner
participant_1.personality: Determined, disciplined, and energetic. She is very focused on her goals and enjoys a competitive environment.
participant_1.background: i am a gold medalist olympian. i workout four hours a day. my favorite color is yellow. i love italian food and garlic bread. gymnastics is my favorite sport.

participant_2.name: James Whitfield
participant_2.personality: Ambitious, confident, and strategic. He has a knack for numbers and enjoys discussing business and finance.
participant_2.background: my parents are very wealthy bankers. i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. i plan to go to business school next year. i drive a bmw.
